Minister of People's Armed Forces meets new Indonesian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Vice marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Il Chol, Minister of the People's Armed Forces, met and had a conversation with new Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Hendrati Sukendar Munthe who paid a courtesy call on him today.
 On hand were KPA generals and officers and staff members of the Indonesian embassy here.
